Begin checkout event.description: Fires a Google Analytics Event with an action of 'begin_checkout', a category of 'ecommerce'.

Login event.description: Fires a Google Analytics Event with an action of 'login', a category of 'engagement', and a label set to what you specify.

Search term event.description: Fires a Google Analytics Event with an action of 'search', a category of 'engagement', and a search term set to what you specify.

Anonymize and send Google Analytics even.description: Sends Google Analytics Events on a web page, events that appear in the Google Analytics Event reports. Configured to only send mandatory action. Optional content removed. IP anonymized.

App or Screen tracking.description: Track specific screen views in Google Analytics.

Send custom dimensions.description: Sends the custom dimension to Google Analytics.

Send custom metric.description: Sends the custom metric to Google Analytics.

Send non-interaction event.description: Sends a non-interaction event on a web page, events that appear in the Google Analytics Event reports.

Send Google Analytics Events - Short ver.description: Sends Google Analytics Events on a web page, events that appear in the Google Analytics Event reports. This snippet omits value.

Send Google Analytics Events - Only acti.description: Sends Google Analytics Events on a web page, events that appear in the Google Analytics Event reports. Configured to only send mandatory action. Optional content removed.

Track user timing.description: Send user timing information to Google Analytics.

Send Google Analytics Events - Full vers.description: Sends Google Analytics Events on a web page, events that appear in the Google Analytics Event reports.

Set persistent values.description: Set values that will be sent with every event for a web page.
